workspace.name: SeqWeb Multi-Repo Workspace
workspace.description: SeqWeb development workspace with seqwebcode, seqwebdata, and oeisdata repositories

ai.context: This is the SeqWeb project workspace containing three repositories: seqwebcode (main development), seqwebdata (generated RDF data), and oeisdata (OEIS source corpus). Focus development work in seqwebcode. The data repositories contain large numbers of files and are excluded from indexing.
